name: Crazy Master Cooking Chef
description:
Here’s a chance to fulfil you dream of becoming a master cooking chef who owns a crazy kitchen filled with cooking madness. Become a restaurant manager with a crazy chef who loves to cook tasty kitchen food for his valuable customers. Challenge yourself in time-management with this top cooking game and satisfy your customer orders in time to become the best kitchen chef in the burger town who is famous for cooking crazy tasty foods that everyone loves.

OXO Games Studio brings you one of the top cooking games in the causal games, fun games and kitchen games category. Keep your eye on the clock and try to complete customer order within time limit to earn exciting rewards, but don’t despair if you fail there’s always the option to use the magic candy and reset patience bar of the customers. You can earn lots of treasures by completing a ton of exciting and challenging game levels. Play now and earn bunch of coins and become the top crazy master cooking chef in the town.

FEATURES:
- Run your very own crazy kitchen with a master cooking chef
- Become a legend of time management in cooking games
- Play a ton of exciting and challenging levels
- Polish your restaurant kitchen management skills
- Use magic candy to reset customer patience bar if it runs out
- Amazing HD Graphics
- Easy to play
- Free to play forever
- No In-App Purchases
- No Wi-Fi required
and much more…
